name: week8-course-selling-app
description: - Initialize a new Node.js project     - Add Express, jswebtoken to it as a dependency     - Create index.js     - Add route skeleton for user login, signup, purchase a course, see course      - Add middleware for user and admin auth     - Add a database(mongodb), use dotenv to store the database connection string     - Define the schema for User, Admin, Course, Purchase     - Complete the routes for user login, signup, purchase a course, see course(Extra points - Use Express routing to better structure your routes)     - Create the frontend
